title: The Cowboy's Bride
description: In this novella, Tessa and Jake have known each other since they were infants. It took one drunken night for them to realize they were in it for the long haul. Of course, life gets in the way of perfection and it takes an arch, a romantic cowboy and a dream of forever for this couple to get together.Paperback EditionSpecial 1 chapter excerpt of Served
author: Danielle Lee Zwissler
